Get data on all players

Source: R/players.R
fpl_get_player_all.Rd

Retrieve player data for the current FPL season, obtained via the elements endpoint.

fpl_get_player_all()

Value

a tibble

Examples

fpl_get_player_all()
#> # A tibble: 624 x 58
#>       id photo web_name team_code status   code first_name second_name
